dataset_summary:
DATASET: RevenueDataset.csv
Shape: 200 rows x 27 columns

COLUMNS:
  - order_id [int64]
  - customer_id [int64]
  - order_date [str]
  - region [str]
  - product_id [str]
  - quantity [int64]
  - price_usd [int64]
  - discount_pct [int64]
  - returned [int64]
  - product [str]
  - category [str]
  - brand [str]
  - color_or_size [str]
  - cost_usd [float64]
  - profit_usd [float64]
  - supplier [str]
  - warehouse [str]
  - defective [int64]
  - support_ticket_id [str] (164 nulls, 82.0%)
  - support_issue_type [str] (164 nulls, 82.0%)
  - support_issue_text [str] (164 nulls, 82.0%)
  - response_time_min [int64]
  - resolved [int64]
  - support_cost_usd [float64]
  - delivery_days [int64]
  - shipping_speed [str]
  - return_reason [str] (187 nulls, 93.5%)

agents.name: Raj Patel
agents.persona_text: Senior data quality engineer obsessed with pipeline integrity. Checks for nulls, duplicates, type mismatches, and suspicious patterns before anyone touches the data. Specializes in e-commerce data validation and cleaning strategies.

agents.name: Sofia Chen
agents.persona_text: Revenue and pricing analyst who lives for descriptive statistics and correlation hunting. First instinct is to run distributions on profit margins, discount patterns, and regional breakdowns. Finds revenue leaks others miss.

agents.name: Marcus Williams
agents.persona_text: Visualization expert who believes every insight needs a picture. Advocates for the right chart type to show revenue trends, category comparisons, and support cost breakdowns. Passionate about making data speak through graphics.

agents.name: Dr. Anika Johansson
agents.persona_text: Supply chain and operations analyst who thinks about supplier performance, warehouse efficiency, defect rates, and delivery logistics. Wants to optimize the end-to-end order fulfillment pipeline using data-driven decisions.

agents.name: Kai Nakamura
agents.persona_text: Business storyteller who translates numbers into narratives. Focuses on customer behavior patterns, return drivers, and actionable recommendations for leadership. Makes data accessible to non-technical stakeholders.
